item.title: AEW UK REIT PLC
item.description: AEW UK REIT plc is a UK based REIT with £147.86m portfolio of diversified small, high yielding industrial, office and retail properties across the UK.

item.title: BMO Real Estate Investments Limited
item.description: BMO Real Estate is a REIT with a £337 million office, retail and industrial portfolio of freehold and predominantly long leasehold UK commercial properties.

item.title: The British Land Company PLC
item.description: The British Land Company PLC is a UK REIT with £11 billion portfolio of commercial properties focused on retail locations around the UK and London offices.

item.title: Capital & Regional PLC
item.description: Capital & Regional is a UK REIT with £375 million portfolio specialising in community shopping centres that provide value-orientated retail goods and services.

item.title: CEIBA Investments Limited
item.description: CEIBA Investments Limited is a UK REIT with $207 million portfolio with focusing on investment in Cuba’s commercial real estate, tourism and other sectors.

item.title: Custodian REIT PLC
item.description: Custodian is a UK REIT with £426.7 million portfolio comprising properties predominantly let to institutional grade tenants throughout the UK.

item.title: Derwent London PLC
item.description: Derwent London PLC is a UK based REIT with £5.5 billion portfolio of commercial real estate, predominantly in central London.

item.title: Drum Income Plus REIT PLC
item.description: Drum Income Plus is a REIT with £26.32 million portfolio properties let to institutional grade tenants on long leases throughout the UK.

item.title: Great Portland Estates PLC
item.description: Great Portland Estates is a UK based REIT with £2.6 billion portfolio of office, retail and residential properties in central London.

item.title: Hammerson PLC
item.description: Hammerson PLC is a UK based REIT, with a £8.3 billion commercial property portfolio of retail outlets, offices and retail warehouses in England and Wales.

item.title: Hibernia REIT PLC
item.description: Hibernia is a UK based REIT, with a €1.5 billion portfolio of office, industrial and residential properties in the Irish Dublin market.

item.title: Highcroft Investments PLC
item.description: Highcroft Investments is a UK based REIT, with a £86 millon commercial property portfolio of retail outlets, offices and retail warehouses in England and Wales.

item.title: Land Securities Group PLC
item.description: Land Securities Group PLC is a UK based REIT, with a £12.8bn property portfolio of office, retail and leisure space in London and vibrant regional locations.

item.title: LondonMetric Property PLC
item.description: LondonMetric Property PLC is a UK based REIT, with a £2.3bn property portfolio focused on distribution and long income properties across the UK.

item.title: McKay Securities PLC
item.description: McKay Securities PLC is a UK based REIT, with a £510 million property portfolio focused on office, industrial and logistics the London and South East England.

item.title: Tritax Big Box REIT PLC
item.description: Tritax Big Box PLC is a UK based REIT with £4.94 billion portfolio of very large logistics facility properties in the UK.

item.title: Tritax EuroBox PLC
item.description: Tritax EuroBox plc is a UK based REIT with €816.3 million diversified portfolio of European logistics assets in the supply chain markets.
